Welcome to my personal website!

I am a molecular ecologist (working predominantly on marine organisms and ecosystems) with 4 years of experience in research. I am very passionate about conservation, science communication, photography, education, and empowering women in STEM. I am happiest when underwater and have ample experience conducting fieldwork on SCUBA (I have been very lucky and privileged to have worked in some of the most beautiful places in the world - I have written about some of these expeditions in my blog).

Here is my CV
